Description: Ostracon, fragmentary section of a red-brown pottery ostracon, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is smeared with an off-white deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394276) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394276)
